subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: The American Sam Querrey advanced to his fourth final of the season on Saturday, beating Rainer Schüttler of Germany, 6-7 (9), 7-5, 6-3, at the Queen’s Club grass-court tournament in London.
snippet: The American Sam Querrey advanced to his fourth final of the season on Saturday, beating Rainer Schüttler of Germany, 6-7 (9), 7-5, 6-3, at the Queen’s Club grass-court tournament in London.
